description: This week, our first place winner on the insightful side is Pixelation with a comment about banning TikTok: Banning TikTok will open the door to the real threat, government control of communication platforms. I would say it’s a republican wet dream, but it’s also a democrat one as well. In second place, it’s That One […]
title: Funniest/Most Insightful Comments Of The Week At Techdirt
